main.welcome: 철권 7 캐릭터 추천 퀴즈에 오신걸 환영합니다!
main.1p: -퀴즈 결과는 어디까지나 '추천'일 뿐이니, 굳이 결과로 나왔다고 해서 억지로 싫어하는 캐릭터를 하실 필요 없습니다.-
main.introParagraph:
이 퀴즈는 철권을 시작하는 유저가 50+개의 캐릭터에 막막할 경우, 생각하는 플레이스타일과 기타 취향을 고려해 유저에게 알맞은 캐릭터를 추천하는게 주 목적입니다.
따라서 문제에 정답은 없습니다 - 당연히 모르시면 그냥 넘어가셔도 무방합니다.
퀴즈 결과와 하고 싶은 캐릭터가 맞지 않는 경우, 먼저 하고 싶은 캐릭터로 시작해 보시는걸 추천드립니다. 결국 직접 해봐야 알 수 있으니까요.
그 밖에 부족한 점이 많을테니 (UI라던가, UI라던가, UI라던가) 부족하시거나 궁금한 점은 아래 링크로 피드백 부탁드립니다.
즐철하세요!

answers.neutral-gender: 성별을 신경쓰지 않습니다. 아무거나 추천해 주세요.
answers.neutral-dlc: 제 취향과 맞다면 DLC를 살 의향이 있습니다.
answers.base-prefer: DLC도 괜찮지만, 가급적이면 기본 게임의 캐릭터로 부탁드립니다.
answers.base-prioritize: DLC를 사고 싶지 않습니다. 기본 게임 캐릭터를 우선적으로 추천해 주세요.
answers.dlc-prioritize: 저는 DLC 캐릭터를 해보고 싶어요. DLC 캐릭터를 우선해주세요.
answers.combo-prioritize: 멋진 고데미지 콤보를 넣는게 최고인 것 같아요.
answers.movement-prioritize: 상대방과의 거리를 재며 기동성을 살리는 플레이가 최고인 것 같아요.
answers.aggression-prioritize: 공격적으로 압박해 들어가는게 제일 좋은 것 같아요.
answers.defense-prioritize: 들어오는 공격들을 방어/패링하는게 제일 좋은 것 같아요.
answers.versatilegoal-prioritize: 다 하고 싶어요, 모든게 어느정도 가능한 캐릭터를 우선해 주세요.
answers.movement-prefer: 상대방과의 거리를 재며 기동성을 살리는 플레이를 하고 싶어요.
answers.versatilegoal-prefer: 다 하고 싶어요, 모든게 어느정도 가능한 캐릭터를 추천해 주세요.
answers.whiff-punish-prioritize: 공격이 헛쳤을때를 캐치해 콤보를 넣는게 최고인 것 같아요.
answers.counterhit-prioritize: Landing a counterhit when my opponent tries to attack.
answers.mixup-prioritize: Aggressive mixups(50/50) that will keep them guessing.
answers.grab-prioritize: Grappling and throwing - they can't break them all.
answers.plus-frame-prioritize: Pressuring with plus frame moves (big/slower moves that stagger the opponent).
answers.poke-prioritize: Poking down the opponent down with a series of low risk moves.
answers.versatileoffense-prioritize: So many options, I would like a character that can specialize in everything.
answers.whiff-punish-prefer: Attacking when the opponent makes a mistake and misses a move.
answers.counterhit-prefer: Landing a counterhit when my opponent tries to attack.
answers.mixup-prefer: Aggressive mixups(50/50) that will keep them guessing.
answers.grab-prefer: Grappling and throwing - they can't break them all.
answers.plus-frame-prefer: Pressuring with plus frame moves (big/slower moves that stagger the opponent).
answers.poke-prefer: Poking down the opponent down with a series of low risk moves.
answers.versatileoffense-prefer: So many options, I would like a character that can specialize in everything.
answers.aggressiveoki-prefer: I aggressively dash in, looking for a followup mixup.
answers.defensiveoki-prefer: I take it safe and reset to a neutral position.
answers.versatileoki-prefer: I would like a character that benefits from both options equally.
answers.neutral-oki: I don't have an opinion. Please don't take okizeme situations into consideration.
answers.setups-important-prioritize: Absolutely! Please try to recommend me a character that focuses on setups.
answers.setups-important-prefer: I prefer setups, but it doesn't take priority over other options.
answers.setups-unimportant-prioritize: I hate setups! Please try to recommend me characters that don't have setups as their focus.
answers.setups-unimportant-prefer: I prefer no setups, but I am willing to play a setup oriented character.
answers.neutral-setups: I don't really have an opinion/I'm not familiar with setups
answers.stance-heavy-prioritize: Stances are great, please try to recommend me a stance heavy character.
answers.stance-heavy-prefer: I prefer having stances, but it doesn't take priority over other options.
answers.stance-light-prioritize: I hate stances. Please try to recommend me characters that aren't stance heavy.
answers.stance-light-prefer: I prefer having no stances, but I am willing to play a character with stances.
answers.neutral-stance: I don't really have an opinion. Please don't take stances into consideration.
answers.movetier-high-prioritize: Yes, I think having good movement is very important
answers.movetier-midhigh-prefer: A little, just don't recommend me characters with bad movement.
answers.neutral-movetier: It's not something I feel strongly about, please don't take movement into consideration.
answers.evasion-high-prioritize: Yes, please prioritize a character with high evasion
answers.evasion-midhigh-prefer: A little, I would enjoy a character that has evasive options.
answers.neutral-evasion: I don't really have an opinion. Please don't take built-in evasion into consideration.
answers.tier-high-prioritize: High tiers (OP characters, top rated characters) prioritize.
answers.tier-mid-prioritize: Mid tiers (good characters with some flaws) prioritize.
answers.tier-low-prioritize: Lower tiers (characters with noticeable flaws) prioritize.
answers.neutral-tier: I don't have a strong opinion on tiers, please don't take it into consideration.
answers.gameplan-level-low-prioritize: Recommend me easier characters that I can start learning Tekken with.
answers.gameplan-level-high-prioritize: Recommend me characters that have challenging execution and gameplan.
answers.neutral-gameplan-level: I don't have a strong preference on character difficulty.
answers.beginner-friendly-prioritize:
I'm trying out fighting games for the first time. Choose a "beginner friendly"character for me.
I understand this is subjective.
